item.title: ChloeLeeNH add a quote by Joseph Addison
item.description: "Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body." -- Joseph Addison

item.title: ChloeLeeNH add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "But when a young lady is to be a heroine, the perverseness of forty surrounding families cannot prevent her. Something must and will happen to throw a hero in her way." -- Jane Austen

item.title: ChloeLeeNH add a quote by Honore De Balzac
item.description: "Passion is univeral humanity. Without it religion history art and romance would be useless." -- Honore De Balzac

item.title: ChloeLeeNH add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: ChloeLeeNH add a quote by Shakespeare; William
item.description: "All days are nights to see till I see thee, And nights bright days when dreams do show thee me." -- Shakespeare; William

item.title: ChloeLeeNH add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: ChloeLeeNH add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "A man does not recover from such devotion of the heart to such a woman! He ought not; he does not." -- Jane Austen

item.title: ChloeLeeNH add a quote by George Plimpton
item.description: "I never understood people who don't have bookshelves." -- George Plimpton

item.title: ChloeLeeNH add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "There is nothing on earth more beautiful to me than your smile...no sound sweeter than your laughter...no pleasure greater than holding you in my arms. I realized today that I could never live without you, stubborn little hellion that you are. In this life and the next, youâ€™re my only hope of happiness. Tell me, Lillian, dearest love...how can you have reached so far inside my heart?" -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: ChloeLeeNH add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss
